nodes.name: Owned

nodes.documentation:
@notice Nominate a new owner of this contract.
@dev Only the current owner may nominate a new owner.
nodes.name: nominateNewOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You must be nominated before you can accept ownership"

arguments.value: You must be nominated before you can accept ownership

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You must be nominated before you can accept ownership"

nodes.documentation: @notice Accept the nomination to be owner.
nodes.name: acceptOwnership

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the contract owner may perform this action"

arguments.value: Only the contract owner may perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the contract owner may perform this action"
